=== Testing NEW FLEXIBLE environment variables functionality ===

1. Default settings (input_items=ON, env_vars_dict=OFF):
#!/usr/bin/env python3
# Auto-generated script for n8n Python Function (Raw)

import json
import sys

# Environment variables (from credentials and system)
API_KEY = 'secret123'
DB_HOST = 'localhost'
PORT = '5432'

# Individual variables from first input item
name = 'test'
value = 123

# Legacy compatibility objects
input_items = [{'name': 'test', 'value': 123}]
# User code starts here
print('Hello world')


============================================================

2. Both legacy objects (input_items=ON, env_vars_dict=ON):
#!/usr/bin/env python3
# Auto-generated script for n8n Python Function (Raw)

import json
import sys

# Environment variables (from credentials and system)
API_KEY = 'secret123'
DB_HOST = 'localhost'
PORT = '5432'

# Individual variables from first input item
name = 'test'
value = 123

# Legacy compatibility objects
input_items = [{'name': 'test', 'value': 123}]
env_vars = {'API_KEY': 'secret123', 'DB_HOST': 'localhost', 'PORT': '5432'}
# User code starts here
print('Hello world')


============================================================

3. Only env_vars dict (input_items=OFF, env_vars_dict=ON):
#!/usr/bin/env python3
# Auto-generated script for n8n Python Function (Raw)

import json
import sys

# Environment variables (from credentials and system)
API_KEY = 'secret123'
DB_HOST = 'localhost'
PORT = '5432'

# Individual variables from first input item
name = 'test'
value = 123

# Legacy compatibility objects
env_vars = {'API_KEY': 'secret123', 'DB_HOST': 'localhost', 'PORT': '5432'}
# User code starts here
print('Hello world')


============================================================

4. No legacy objects (input_items=OFF, env_vars_dict=OFF):
#!/usr/bin/env python3
# Auto-generated script for n8n Python Function (Raw)

import json
import sys

# Environment variables (from credentials and system)
API_KEY = 'secret123'
DB_HOST = 'localhost'
PORT = '5432'

# Individual variables from first input item
name = 'test'
value = 123

# User code starts here
print('Hello world')


============================================================

5. Hidden values (input_items=ON, env_vars_dict=ON, hide=ON):
#!/usr/bin/env python3
# Auto-generated script for n8n Python Function (Raw)

import json
import sys

# Environment variables (from credentials and system)
API_KEY = "***hidden***"
DB_HOST = "***hidden***"
PORT = "***hidden***"

# Individual variables from first input item
name = "***hidden***"
value = "***hidden***"

# Legacy compatibility objects
input_items = "***hidden***"
env_vars = "***hidden***"
# User code starts here
print('Hello world')
